events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Captures the start of the return process.

events.name: ReturnReceived
events.description: Indicates the returns department has received the item back.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Represents the approval of the return request.

events.name: ReturnDenied
events.description: Captures cases where a return request is denied.

events.name: RefundProcessed
events.description: Signifies that a refund has been processed for the return.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Captures the start of the return process.

commands.name: ReceiveReturn
commands.description: Indicates the returns department has received the item back.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Represents the approval of the return request.

commands.name: DenyReturn
commands.description: Captures cases where a return request is denied.

commands.name: ProcessRefund
commands.description: Signifies that a refund has been processed for the return.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with inventory systems to update stock levels after returns.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with customer service systems for tracking returned products.

integrationPoints.name: Accounting
integrationPoints.description: Integration point for processing financial aspects of returns.
